Address.label: Address
Address.value: 6900 E LAYTON AVENUE,SUITE 700, DENVER, Colorado, 80237, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Newmont Corp is primarily a gold producer with operations and/or assets in the United States, Canada, Mexico, Dominican Republic, Peru, Suriname, Argentina, Chile, Australia, and Ghana. It is also engaged in the production of copper, silver, lead and zinc. The company's operations are organized in five geographic regions: North America, South America, Australia, Africa and Nevada.
